channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: B&M selling 'beautiful' £65 perfume for £19 that people say 'lasts all day'
item.description: B&M shoppers can get themselves the perfume's gift set worth £65 for just £19 in stores in a 'great value for money' beauty deal

item.title: The mystery of bizarre creature that prowled our oceans 500,000,000 years ago
item.description: It has been nicknamed the 'alien fish taco'.

item.title: What a cruise ship really looks like during storm – and it's really not pleasant
item.description: A TikTok user went viral after sharing a video of a cruise ship swimming pool overflowing during a storm - while ships can typically 'outrun' a storm, 'crazy' scenes are often present on deck

item.title: Woman who said her husband chained her to tree for 40 days ‘tied herself up’
item.description: The woman initially claimed her husband had left her in the forest for 40 days.

item.title: Explorer climbs into abandoned mortuary in Scottish woodland and makes chilling find
item.description: Chloe Urbex has racked up thousands of followers on TikTok through her urban exploring exploits and a recent trip to an abandoned Scottish mortuary proved as popular as ever

item.title: Police hunting for 23 people they still want to speak to over violent riots across parts of UK
item.description: Greater Manchester Police have released images of 23 people they still want to speak to over the recent riots after a previous appeal saw suspects brought before a judge

item.title: 'Furious' Meghan Markle delivers 'brazen message to royals' with Colombia tour
item.description: Meghan and Harry will soon visit Colombia after receiving an invitation from Vice President Francia Márquez. And, according to a source, Meghan is using the trip to send a strong message to the royals
